name: LUP (itch) (Fran Sánchez)
description:
LUP is a small self-conclusive (or not) level, homework for the Design subject in VII Video Games Development Master at University of Málaga.

Guide Gboy to the exit, but watch out for the saw or you will have to start all over again. Although on second thought, may the saw not be the issue..

If you like the assets and sounds, they are from Kenney.

Thanks 4 playing!
